snippet.title: Official DEAD TRIGGER 2 Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Download DEAD TRIGGER 2 from iTunes: http://goo.gl/wqL9AV
Download DEAD TRIGGER 2 from Google Play: http://goo.gl/vyANfW

The award-winning stunning first person zombie shooter is back!
Join the new sequel to Dead Trigger, the popular mobile hit with more than 23M downloads!

Download Dead Trigger 2 on App Store and Google Play for FREE and enter a world where humanity is engaged in the ultimate battle for survival in the face of a global Zombie apocalypse.

Find a safe place to hide-out, get equipped, and fight for your life in a real time bid for survival against an onslaught of bloodthirsty undead. Join the Global Resistance and fight to crush the Zombie plague that has positioned the Earth on the edge of peril. It's up to you to provide humanity with a new chance at survival.

Stay updated on all of the latest Dead Trigger 2 news!
Like Dead Trigger on Facebook http://www.facebook.com/DEADTRIGGER
Follow us on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/MADFINGERgames
Visit official website: http://www.deadtrigger2.com
